Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: BHARTHUAA STANZA
The drums sounded, the horses swung and the warriors thundered.189.
The thundering warriors discharged arrows, their shields were raised and the rhythmic sound was heard.190.
The daggers glistened, the flaming fires blazed and the flames rose high.191.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਸੂਰਮਿਆਂ ਦਾ) ਚਾਉ (ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੇ ਮੂੰਹ ਤੋਂ) ਝਲਕਦਾ ਹੈ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The blood oozed out from the wounds, which demonstrated the zeal of the warriors, they ran and fell in the multitude.192.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਡਰਾਕਲ ਕੰਬਦੇ ਹਨ (ਜਾਂ ਪਸੀਨੇ ਨਾਲ ਭਿਜ ਜਾਂਦੇ ਹਨ) ॥੧੯੨॥
(ਸ਼ਸਤ੍ਰਾਂ ਦੇ ਵਾਰ ਦੇ) ਤਾਲ ਟੁੱਟਦੇ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The helmets broke, the drums sounded and the heavenly damsels danced in consonance with the tune.193.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਅੰਗ) ਯੁੱਧ ਵਿਚ ਕਟੇ ਜਾ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The limbs were chopped, they fell down and because of the discharged arrows, the warriors were tossed about violently.194.
The warriors fought bravely and the cowards ran away, the heroic fighters were filled with anger and malice.195.
With the discharge of the arrows, the cowards ran away and the zeal was exhibited by the oozing wounds.196.
The limbs and corpses of the warriors engaged in war fell up and down.197.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਕੱਟੇ ਹੋਏ ਸਿਰਾਂ ਨੂੰ (ਮਾਲਾਵਾਂ ਵਿਚ ਪਰੋ ਕੇ)

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The shields gleamed and seeing the chopped heads, Shiva began to dance and wear the rosaries of skulls.198.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਲੋਥਾਂ ਲੋਟ ਪੋਟ ਹੋ ਰਹੀਆਂ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The horses sprang and the warriors seeing the corpses and chopped heads got pleased.199.
The swords saturated with hot blood glistened and Shiva danced and laughed.200.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਤੀਰ ਛੁਟ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ। (ਸ਼ਹੀਦ ਹੋਣ ਵਾਲੇ ਸੂਰਮਿਆਂ ਨੂੰ)

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The warriors, getting together, began to discharge arrows and taking their gleaming shields they began to wed the heavenly damsels.201.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਗੁਰਜਾਂ (ਦੇ ਵਜਣ ਦੀਆਂ) ਆਵਾਜ਼ਾਂ ਉਠਦੀਆਂ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The intoxicated sound is rising from all the four sides and the chopped limbs are falling down in the battlefield.202.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜੰਗ (ਦੇ ਮੈਦਾਨ) ਵਿਚ ਡਿਗ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ ॥੨੦੨॥
(ਯੁੱਧ) ਭੂਮੀ ਵਿਚ ਜਾ ਕੇ ਜੂਝਦੇ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The warriors are fighting with each other with great zeal and the musical instruments are being and played in the battlefield.203.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਖੰਭਾਂ ('ਪਤ੍ਰੀ') ਵਾਲੇ ਤੀਰ ਪਰੁਚੇ ਹੋਏ ਚਲਦੇ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The tips of the arms and weapons are entering the bodies and the Kshatriyas are striking their arms and weapons in the battlefield.204.
The warriors falling on the earth and then swinging up and fighting are shouting for water.205.
The directions have disappeared by the discharge of arrows, the warriors are falling and the cowards are running away.206.
Shiva while dancing and playing his tabor is roaming and wearing the rosaries of skulls.207.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਭਿਆਨਕ ਸ਼ਕਲ ਵਿਚ ਘੁੰਮ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ ॥੨੦੭॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The heavenly damsels are dancing and with the dreadful fighting by warriors and running away by the cowards, there is a break in the tune.208.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਸੂਰਮੇ) ਅੱਧ ਵਿਚ ਕਟੇ ਜਾ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The warriors fall on being struck by the arrows and the headless trunks of the warriors are being chopped through the middle.209.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੇ ਮਨ ਵਿਚ) ਦੂਣਾ ਚਾਉ ਚੜ੍ਹਿਆ ਹੋਇਆ ਹੈ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The blood-spilling warriors are fighting with double zeal and with the blows of the arms, the canopies of the warriors being cut down, are falling.210.
The tips of the striking arms are piercing the bodies, the horses are neighing and the warriors are thundering.211.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਲੜਦੇ ਹੋਏ ਯੋਧੇ) ਭੂਮੀ ਉਤੇ ਡਿਗ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The shields and the armours are being cut, the warriors are falling on the earth and getting up while swinging.212.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਘੁੰਮੇਰੀ ਖਾ ਕੇ ਉਠ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ ॥੨੧੨॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The hands have fought with hands, the young soldiers being chopped and the arrows, flying numerously are being planted in the bodies.213.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਅਨੇਕਾਂ (ਦੇ ਸ਼ਰੀਰ ਵਿਚ) ਗਡੇ ਜਾਂਦੇ ਹਨ ॥੨੧੩॥
